description:
Merging magic and technology,
Infinite Dunamis ups the ante with new
turn-based battles in an epic RPG
adventure!

One day on his way home from a job
in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by
the name of Luke comes across a
young woman, Estelle, being attacked
in the cave near his village. After
fending off her attackers, he attempts
to pull her from a heap of discarded
mechanical parts only to discover she
herself is half robot! Somewhat
curious about what he has stumbled
onto, Luke decides to take Estelle
home and fix her up, but little does he
know about the chain of events he is
about to find himself tangled up in...!

With its unique steam-punk setting,
gripping plot-twists, and classic
turn-based battle system with a twist,
Infinite Dunamis is the RPG to satisfy
even the hungriest of gamers!
Moreover, with its plethora of features
like weapon enhancement, magic
skills, and the ability to strengthen
Estelle's parameters through the use
of crystals, souls, and cores, gamers
are sure to experience countless hours
of enjoyment!
name: Infinite Dunamis
